channel.title: Get Involved on DataForNerds
channel.description: Recent content in Get Involved on DataForNerds

item.title: How to Get Involved
item.description: Getting Involved If you’re interested in getting involved with DataForNerds.io, please check out: Our GitHub Respository for where we generate the JSON files, perhaps you know a better way to do something or have another datasource to add. Check our our issues list to see if there’s something you might be able to fix. Our Website Repository if you notice a typo or have a better way to describe something.
